message: We don't even follow our own laws & now this?! But seriously, Shariah law does not allow usury (bye bye mortgage fraud) & is a serious threat to the banksters once the people discover that it really is possible to bank without fraud... And perhaps this is the real reason for the crackdown?

Bill's sponsors say the Islamic code is a danger to homeland security; one critic calls the proposal 'complete nonsense.'SPECIAL REPORT: The Price of Fear
